message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: Assigned role of case owner for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: Role of case owner for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed.

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: Assigned role of case supervisor for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: Role of case supervisor for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: You have been assigned the role of case owner for case %1s by %2s. %3s

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: Your role as case owner for case %1s has been closed by %2s. The new case owner is %3s. %4s

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR_REASON
message.locale: You have been assigned the role of case supervisor for case %1s by %2s. %3s

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_SUPERVISOR_REASON
message.locale: Your role as case supervisor for case %1s has been closed by %2s. The new case supervisor is %3s. %4s

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_REVIEWER_REASON
message.locale: You have been assigned the role of case reviewer for case %1s by %2s.

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_CASE_REVIEWER
message.locale: Assigned role of case reviewer for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s by %4s.

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_REVIEWER_REASON
message.locale: Your role as case reviewer for case %1s has been closed by %2s. The new case reviewer is %3s.

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_CASE_REVIEWER
message.locale: Role of case reviewer for Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_FV_FROMDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: From date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_FROMDATE_TODATE
message.locale: From date must not be later than to date.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_FV_TODATE
message.locale: To date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_NEW_OLD_OWNER
message.locale: New case owner must not be same as the previous case owner.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_NEW_OLD_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: New case supervisor must not be equal to the old case supervisor.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_NEW_OLD_REVIEWER
message.locale: New case reviewer must not be equal to the old case reviewer.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_FV_OWNER
message.locale: Owner must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_FV_USERNAME
message.locale: User name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_FV_USER
message.locale: User must be assigned to a position.

message.name: ERR_RV_USER_CANCELLED
message.locale: The user %1s is canceled and cannot be assigned as owner.
The user %1s is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_RV_POSITION_CANCELLED
message.locale: The position %1s is canceled and cannot be assigned as owner.
The position %1s is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_RV_ORG_UNIT_CANCELLED
message.locale: The organization unit %1s is canceled and cannot be assigned as owner.
The organisation unit %1s is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XRV_CASE_OWNER_USER_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: A closed user cannot be assigned for the role of owner on a case.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XRV_CASE_SUPERVISOR_USER_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: A closed user cannot be assigned for the role of supervisor on a case.

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_DYNAMICALLY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: There is currently no user assigned as case supervisor for this case. The supervisor role will be evaluated dynamically.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_RV_NO_SUPERVISOR_EXISTS
message.locale: There is currently no supervisor assigned for this case.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_POSITION_CANCELLED
message.locale: The position %1s is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: The owner you have chosen does not match the owner type chosen. Please search for owner again.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_INVALID_EXTERNAL_TYPE
message.locale: The external user type has not been configured. Please configure this before continuing.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_INVALID_EXTERNAL_REFERENCE
message.locale: The external user reference has not been configured. Please configure this before continuing.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_INVALID_CASE_OWNER_TYPE
message.locale: The case owner type configured is invalid. Please configure this before continuing.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_XFV_SYSTEM_USER_CASE_OWNER_CONFIG_NOT_SET
message.locale: The case owner type configured is invalid. Please configure this before continuing.

message.name: ERR_ENV_CASE_OWNER_FOR_ORGANISATION_OBJECT_REFERENCE_OR_USERNAME
message.locale: Either the organization object reference or user name must be entered.
Either the organisation object reference or user name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEUSERROLE_FV_CASEOWNER_NOT_SET
message.locale: No case owner can be assigned, as no potential case owner identified has an active position.

message.name: ERR_CASE_OWNER_DETERMINATION_FAILED
message.locale: The case ownership strategy associated with this case type was not able to determine a case owner. Please contact your system administrator.
